channel.title: Portal?
channel.description: how do i make a portal teleport you somewhere?

item.title: Portal?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

You first need to add the portal to global objects, which can be done by searching for “makeglobalobject” in client.java.

Add this and change it to suit you : -

makeGlobalObject(3119, 9847, 2213, 0, 10);

First number is X coord
Second number is Y coord
Third number is object ID

Don’t worry about the other numbers as you wont be changing it’s rotation as it’s a portal.

Then add this (THIS IS MY EXAMPLE)

if ((objectID == 2473) && (objectX == 2755) && (objectY == 3495)) {
triggerTele(2266, 4683, 0);
sM(“You teleport to the KBD Lair, make sure you have an anti-dragon sheild!”);
}

object ID is there portals ID, triggerTele is where you want the portal to tele you you, sM is sending the player a message (Delta-Based).

Post if you need me to explain it more

Read full topic
